Public Overrides Function ConvertTo (context As ITypeDescriptorContext, culture As CultureInfo, value As Object, destinationType As Type) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ ConvertTo(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context, System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ culture, System::Object ^ value, Type ^ destinationType);
override this.ConvertTo : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext * System.Globalization.CultureInfo * obj * Type -> obj

Docs.param: An implementation that provides a format context.
A object. If a null reference is passed, the current culture is assumed.
The desired type to convert to.
Docs.summary: Converts the given value object to a type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Only a `destinationType` of <xref:System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension> returns a value originating from this implementation. Any other type provided for `destinationType` causes this method to call base, which results in no usable converted value and only serves for basic validation of the remaining parameters.
